0011000010111011 1011010111100011 1 -> sum: 1110011010011111, cout: 0
1001110000110000 0100111000000101 0 -> sum: 1110101000110101, cout: 0
1111011010000111 1010110101101000 0 -> sum: 1010001111101111, cout: 1
1110100011110110 1101010101101010 1 -> sum: 1011111001100001, cout: 1
1011011010101110 1011110111001010 0 -> sum: 0111010001111000, cout: 1
0001011001010101 1100111000000000 0 -> sum: 1110010001010101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
